Subject: [DeDuplicator] Skipping URLs marked as duplicates from being 
     indexed
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=284768837

Hi *,

URLs marked as duplicates are being added to the DeDuplicator-index when
running the DigestIndexer in its current implementation.
Would't it make sense to add an option to skip such URLs ?
This would keep the index small and speed up the indexing process.

Or is there any reason not to do this, that I haven't thought of?

Max
